description:
A PFD for paddlers who don’t want a PFD – until they’re swimming or the Harbour Patrol pulls them over. As sleek as a waistpack, this little unit will appeal to stand up paddleboarders or anyone who dislikes bulky foam flotation devices.

  • TPU coated nylon shell with 3D mesh liner for next to skin comfort
  • A quick tug on the inflation cord deploys 18.9lbs. of buoyancy
  • Pillow style bladder is simple to repack
  • Two zippered pockets and mesh stash pocket with key loop keeps your essentials secure
  • Universal adult sizing is legal for those 16 and older, weighing 36.3kg (80lbs.) or more, and up to a 132cm (52in.) chest
  • Inflatable PFDs must be worn on your person to be legal (no stowing them in your boat or on your board)
  • Inflatable PFDs are not legal for whitewater paddling in Canada
name: Mustang Survival Essentialist Belt Pack Inflatable PFD - Unisex
